article:
Mr. Smith works in a museum. He likes his job and always goes to work _ than others.
One day Mr. Smith forgot the lunchtime, so he planned to buy _ to eat at a shop. When he came into the shop, he met an old friend. They didn't see each other _  about five years, so they were very excited. His friend wanted him to drink together. Mr. Smith didn't agree  with him at first, because he worried about being _ , but he agreed at last. They went into a restaurant and drank a lot. Then his friend said, " You drank too much. Let me _ you back to your office.
"No, no," said Mr. Smith. "My office is _ five minutes' walk. I can go there by myself." Then his friend left. It was _ to stand up and it was too late, so he stopped a taxi. When he got into the taxi, the driver asked, " _ are you going, sir?"
"Park Street."
The driver _ surprised and said, "Oh! It's just Park Street here, sir."
"OK!"Mr. Smith said and got off the taxi. He brought out some _ and gave it to the driver and shouted. "But don't drive so fast next time."
